title: Minihams no Ai no Uta
synopsis: Minihams no Ai no Uta is the third single of the Morning Musume subgroup Minimoni. It was released on December 5, 2001 and sold 325,440 copies, reaching number three on the Oricon Charts.
related_anime: ['Tottoko Hamtarou Movie 1: Ham-Ham Land Daibouken', 'Minihams no Kekkon Song']
